snippet.title: Big Fat Battle - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Team up for a fast-paced PvP third-person shooter with roguelike loadouts. Fight for survival in a series of knockout based rounds featuring ridiculous characters, outrageous weapons, and potent power-ups.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1941980/Big_Fat_Battle/
